articles.description: NVIDIA's flagship GeForce RTX 4090 graphics card powered by the AD102 GPU has entered testing phase with 24 Gbps GDDR6X memory.
articles.content:
NVIDIA's next-gen AD102 GPU is currently being tested for the GeForce RTX 4090 graphics card, as reported by Kopite7kimi.
NVIDIA GeForce RTX 4090 Rumors: Flagship AD102 GPU Enters Test Phase, 24 Gbp… [+6790 chars]
